ygData.subject: Re: New character and Wisdom
ygData.msgSnippet: I currently have a lvl 13 human paladin with 85 wisdom and have never had a problem at all with casting my spells (except the ocassional fail) =).
ygData.messageBody:
I currently have a lvl 13 human paladin with 85 wisdom and have never had a
problem at all with casting my spells (except the ocassional fail) =).

Stuart Christian wrote:

> From: "Stuart Christian" <stuartc@...>
>
> I made a Paladin again last night, I had one that made it to level 5 then I
> deleted him because I couldn't make any exp, and I realized once I hit level
> 4 that I might not put enough points into Wisdom to be able to cast all the
> spells when I first get them. I had this same problem with my SK where I
> wasn't able to cast 2 of my spells until level 11. This was one of the
> reasons why I quit playing him, the other because I like to explore and it's
> very difficult when you're a huge Troll. So, I was wondering if 90 Wisdom
> is enough to be able to cast all the spells when I get them. I'm really
> afraid of playing this character up to level 50 and still not be able to
> cast Revive(49) or something to that effect. My race is a Dwarf if that
> effects it. Thanks.
>
> -Kalamar (E'ci)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for the perfect gift for a friend?
